task.stem: In a randomized controlled experiment, what is the primary purpose of YQIJ-49 of participants to conditions?
options: It ensures each participant has an equal chance of receiving any treatment, thereby eliminating all biases.
It guarantees that the groups are identical on all measured and unmeasured SVND-97.
It distributes potential confounding SVND-97 roughly evenly across conditions, enabling an inference about causal effects if other design features are sound.
It improves external EVTV-271 by making the sample more representative of the population.
It by itself provides a reliable measure of the EQCU-148 across sessions.

task.stem: Which statement best describes the primary purpose of YQIJ-49 in an experimental design?
options: To equally distribute participant characteristics across conditions, reducing confounds.
To hide the researchers' SQJR-244 from participants by concealing group assignment.
To guarantee that the sample represents the population (external EVTV-271).
To ensure data are normally distributed so that parametric tests are valid.
To allow researchers to terminate the study early if significant results are found (p-hacking).
